document.title: UX Report: DataONE Website User-Experience Test Results
document.publication-title: DataONE Sociocultural and Usability & Assessment Working Groups

field.name: comments
field.value: The University of Tennesseeâ€™s Center for Information and Communication Studies (CICS) conducted a standard usability study for the DataONE website (www.dataone.org). The study focused on new users to DataONE, for example, those who heard about DataONE in a presentation and want to learn more. This report discusses the finding and provides suggestions and recommendations for improvement.
